# Shared Blessing (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 2]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched (not you)

**Duration:** 1 minute/level (see text)

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Book of Experimental Might I (Malhavoc Press), pg. 73

Calling upon divine forces, you grant the subject of the spell a +1 morale bonus to Armor Class and a +2 morale bonus to saving throws. However, if you and the subject move more than 10 feet apart at any time, the spell ends.

You cannot cast this spell on yourself.
